title: WTB: A T-206 Larry Doyle Any Pose, Any Back PSA 1-3 Or SGC 10-40
author: obcbeatle

posts.post_title: WTB: A T-206 Larry Doyle Any Pose, Any Back PSA 1-3 Or SGC 10-40
posts.post_content:
Hello:

I would like to buy a PSA or SGC T-206 Larry Doyle card, any pose, any back, in PSA 1-3 or SGC 10-40 condition. I prefer to pay via PayPal. Please PM me if you happen to have one for sale so I can take a look. Thank you!
